entry.title: Arpityadav11/HomiFy: HomiFy is a lightweight Airbnb-inspired web application built with Node.js, Express, EJS, and MongoDB. It allows users to list and explore accommodations, providing an intuitive and user-friendly experience for travelers and hosts.

entry.title: adityasingh9699/lightweight-cache: A flexible, lightweight, and thread-safe in-memory caching library for microservices and small-scale applications. Supports time-based expiration, size-based eviction, and can cache any type of object including lists, maps, and custom data structures. Ideal for quick caching needs in distributed services.
entry.content: A flexible, lightweight, and thread-safe in-memory caching library for microservices and small-scale applications. Supports time-based expiration, size-based eviction, and can cache any type of object including lists, maps, and custom data structures. Ideal for quick caching needs in distributed services.
